effects: 5% max health increase | 8% run speed increase | 5% damage increase | 6% crit chance increase
name: Hope
notes: Has no effect until you unlock the Vigor, Venture, Pace, Awe, and Rule outfits.

effects: 5% max health increase | 8% run speed increase | 4% armor increase | 5% evade chance increase
name: Patience
notes: Has no effect until you unlock the Vigor, Venture, Grit, Shift, and Tempo outfits.

name: Grit
notes: Armor and Defense are not the same stats.

effects: 16% run speed increase | 5% evade chance increase
name: Pace

effects: 10% evade chance increase | 6% crit chance increase
name: Shift

effects: 12% crit chance increase | 20% crit damage increase
name: Awe

effects: 10% damage increase | 16% run speed increase | 12% cooldown decrease | 40% max health decrease
name: Venture
notes: Becomes available for purchase after defeating a council member for the first time. If Savile is used in the trials, max health will not be affected.

effects: Reduces max health to 1 | Shields disabled
name: Pride
notes: Available for purchase upon defeating Master Sura.

effects: 5% max health increase | 12% run speed increase | 8% evade chance increase | 8% cooldown decrease
name: Savile Special
notes: Purchased from Savile in the Plaza for 5 gems. This alteration will overwrite all other effects from the outfit you are currently wearing. Pride outfit cannot be modified. This effect will disappear after your next run, and the outfit will return to normal.
